original_text: And Leah conceived and bore a son, and she called his name Reuben, for she said, “Because the Lord has looked upon my affliction; for now my husband will love me.”
korean_text: 레아가 임신하여 아들을 낳고 그 이름을 르우벤이라 하여 이르되 여호와께서 나의 괴로움을 돌보셨으니 이제는 내 남편이 나를 사랑하리로다 하였더라

sentences.original_text: and she called his name Reuben
Because the Lord has looked upon my affliction
for now my husband will love me
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 내 남편이 나를 사랑하게 되리라
